a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Learning-adjusted years of schooling vs. Corruption Perception
Learning-adjusted years of schooling merge the quantity and quality of education into one metric, accounting for the fact
that similar durations of schooling can yield different learning outcomes.
Learning adjusted total years of schooling (years)
Data source: World Bank (2024); Transparency International (2018)
Note: Transparency International's Corruption Perception Index lower values reflect higher perceived corruption).
